Dean Schmeltz personal website I was born in Elgin, IL in 1991. I received my B.A. in Linguistics from Reed College in 2014, and I am currently pursuing an M.S.Ed. in Intercultural Communication from the University of Pennsylvania (anticipated May 2018).
